  suma = 10101010
     i = 01010101
numero = 01011010
 media = 10100101


Asignar(suma,0);           11111111(10101010,00000000)
Asignar(i,1);              11111111(01010101,00000001)
Si(i<=10);                 00011000(01010101 00011000 00010010 00001010)
entonces...;               00100000
Leer(numero);              00001000(01011010)
suma = Sumar(suma,numero); 10101010 00111101 11111100(10101010 01011010)
i = Sumar(i,1);            01010101 00111101 11111100(01010101 00000001)
sino...;                   01000000
media = Dividir(suma/10);  10100101 00111101 11111100(10101010 00001010)
Imprimir(media);           00010000(10100101)
fin_si;                    10000000


CÃ“DIGO BINARIO PURO:
111111111010101000000000111111110101010100000001000110000101010100011000000100100000101000100000000010000101101010101010001111011111110010101010010110100101010100111101111111000101010100000001010000001010010100111101111111001010101000001010000100001010010110000000
